name: INRequestPaymentIntentResponseCode
desc: Constants indicating the state of the response.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: The response didn’t specify a response code.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: You are ready to handle the intent.

items.name: case inProgress
items.desc: You are in the process of handling the intent.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: You were unable to deliver the payment request.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: The user must launch your app to make the payment request.

items.name: case failureCredentialsUnverified
items.desc: The request failed because you couldn’t verify one of the user’s credentials.

items.name: case failurePaymentsAmountBelowMinimum
items.desc: The request failed because the specified amount was below the required minimum established by your app.

items.name: case failurePaymentsAmountAboveMaximum
items.desc: The request failed because the specified amount was above the allowed maximum established by your app.

items.name: case failurePaymentsCurrencyUnsupported
items.desc: The request failed because your app does not support the specified currency.

items.name: case failureNoBankAccount
items.desc: The request failed because you couldn’t determine a user’s bank account information.

items.name: case failureNotEligible
items.desc: The request failed because a user was not eligible to perform the transaction.

items.name: case failureTermsAndConditionsAcceptanceRequired
items.desc: The request failed because the user must accept the app’s terms and conditions.
